junk.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
junk.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to get rid of something because it is old or useless
junk.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: email etc sent to someone who has not requested it, usually to advertise something
junk.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: The system allows the user to receive only filtered messages, a benefit in dealing with junk email.
